Title: Relates to certain preliminary injunctions
Summary: Provides that the failure of a party challenging a building permit, variance, subdivision or other land use approval to seek a preliminary injunction to prevent construction shall not give rise to the opposing party raising the defense of mootness if such party continues and/or completes construction with knowledge that an action challenging its land use approval has been timely commenced.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to certain preliminary injunctions
